aka: War Is Over! If You Want It
War Is Over! Inspired by the Music of John & Yoko
awards:
第96届奥斯卡金像奖(2024)
　　最佳动画短片 戴夫·穆林斯 / 布拉德·布克

　　第51届动画安妮奖(2024)
　　最佳动画短片
trans_title: War Is Over! If You Want It
War Is Over! Inspired by the Music of John & Yoko
introduction: Set in an alternate WWI reality where a senseless war rages on, two soldiers on opposite sides of the conflict play a joyful game of chess. A heroic carrier pigeon delivers the soldiers' chess moves over the battlefield as the fighting escalates. Neither soldier knows his opponent as the game and the war builds to its climatic final move. Whoever wins the game, one thing is for certain: there are no winners in war.
